body:
On Windows `HOME` is `HOMEPATH`.

``` powershell
Describing Environment-Variables
 [+] Should have environment variables 66ms
 [+] Should have a nonempty PATH 14ms
 [+] Should contain /bin in the PATH 14ms
 [-] Should have the correct HOME 33ms
   Expected: {\Users\andrew}
   But was:  {}
   at line: 32 in C:\Users\andrew\src\PowerShell-Linux\test\powershell\Environment-Variables.Tests.ps1
   32:             $ENV:HOME | Should Be $expected
 [+] Should be able to set the environment variables 32ms
```
title: Fix HOME environment variable Pester test for Windows
